sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memulai pekerjaan saya yang pertama hari ini.
english translation: I started my first job today.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus menyelesaikan tugas yang ketiga sekarang.
english translation: I have to finish my third task now.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Seorang siswa mendapatkan nilai tertinggi pada ujian yang ketujuh.
english translation: A student got the highest score in the seventh exam.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Harga konsumsi di Jepang naik karena kenaikan nilai yen Jepang.
english translation: The consumption price in Japan rises due to the appreciation of Japanese yen.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kelas yang kesepuluh memiliki guru baru sekarang.
english translation: The tenth grade has a new teacher now.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Zebra adalah hewan dengan garis-garis hitam dan putih.
english translation: Zebra is an animal with black and white stripes.
